This document is the Mercury SDK specification.

See:
          Description

Packages
com.mogreet.mercury Provides the classes necessary to create a Mercury object (requests) and a Response object.
com.mogreet.mercury.system Provides the classes necessary to create system requests that test connectivity to Moms API servers.
com.mogreet.mercury.transaction Provides the classes necessary to create transaction requests that can initiate SMS or MMS sends and lookup information on sends.
com.mogreet.mercury.user Provides the classes necessary to create user requests that expose users' basic information, transactions, and campaign status.

 

This document is the Mercury SDK specification. It allows developers to use the MoMS (Mogreet Message System) API through Java.

The MoMS is a dynamic SMS, MMS and email messaging system which supports many different clients, many different campaigns, many different message flows, many different aggregators and many different carriers. This SDK provides programmatic control of the MoMS API through Java. Using this SDK, a client can trigger a send to a user over SMS, MMS, or email, check the status of a send, manage opt-in status and more.

Author:
Nicolas Payot - Mogreet, Inc (www.mogreet.com)
